installCommand: corepack enable && TARGET=apps/web; if [ -f package.json ] && grep -q '"next"' package.json; then TARGET=.; fi; npx -y pnpm@10.30.1 install --dir "$TARGET" --config.package-manager-strict=false --no-frozen-lockfile
buildCommand: TARGET=apps/web; if [ -f package.json ] && grep -q '"next"' package.json; then TARGET=.; fi; npx -y pnpm@10.30.1 --config.package-manager-strict=false --dir "$TARGET" run build
